newsitem.title: UK: Chubb Security says in talks, may get offer.
newsitem.headline: Chubb Security says in talks, may get offer.

text.p: Britain's Chubb Security Plc said on Thursday it was in talks that may lead to a recommended offer being made for the company.
"Such an offer, if made, is not expected to exceed a value of 450p per share," the firm said in a statement.
Chubb, which provides electronic and physical security services, said it expected to make a further announcement shortly.
Chubb's shares shot up more than 20 percent, gaining 76.5p to 417.5p to rank as the London Stock Exchange's top percentage gainer by 1000 GMT.
Earlier, a comment by the Financial Times newspaper highlighted Chubb's possible attractions to a predator, possibly from the U.S.
